title: Skillshots
body: Why the hell are they all so much worse than the point and click abilities in this game?

Jhin's auto is 550 range and single target. Ezreal ult damages any unfriendly targets it passes through, all the way across the map.

Draven's auto is 550 range and single target. Kayn's W is a 700-range AoE.

Garen Q is melee range, damaging and silencing a single target. Orianna's ult has a range of up to 1125 units, damaging and displacing all targets hit in an AoE.

I think you might be comparing apples to oranges.
i think its more with cc, point and click hard cc should never be above 1.5 secs period
